item.title: Alley by China Gags, 7th October
item.description:
Member Enquiry 19268364, following emai was sent "In response to your query received on 22 September 2025, I can confirm that the alleyway was inspected yesterday and bags of rubbish were found to have been dumped here.the waste has now been referred for clearance, which will take place within the next 24hrs" This has still not been cleared and some of rubbish has blown around so whole area now needs clearing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mera Drive, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 236 Friern, 7th October
item.description:
Houses have put bins on pavement which is a busy school route. There is space in the garden. Please remove them - back in garden and explain why they should not do this. They are alone in doimg this. Itâ€™s bad for elderly and disabled and those with bad eyesight. Please action soonest. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 203, Friern Road, East Dulwich, London
